title: Amasis specimen?
content:
Does any of you know where I can find a specimen for Amasis? Or could someone of you make one for me, please?

It's kind of surprising that there's none either on Typophile or Monotype's website either.

Thanks
author: Pierre-Luc Auclair

comments.content: Oh, I just found one on Lynotype's website (didn't occur to me they'd sell it).
What exactly do you want to see in your specimen?
You can also set custom samples and see the character set at [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720135923/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/amasis_std_regular/).
